settings.ban_head: A hangover cure that actually works
settings.ban_para: UNDOit support your mind and body's recovery after sessions on the dancefloor, at a festival or in your living room.

settings.head: coffee
settings.para: diuretic, dehydrates the body. narrows blood vessels & raises blood pressure could worsen headache

settings.head: oily food
settings.para: upsets your already sensitive digestive system, worsening hangover

settings.head: water
settings.para: not enough nutritional support to undo the damage doneÂ by alcohol

settings.head: ENERGY & HYDRATION
settings.content:
niacin
Niacin, a B vitamin, helps regulate electrolyte balance in the body, crucial for hydration and overall fluid balance, especially during and after alcohol consumption.

potassium chloride
Potassium chloride helps replenish vital electrolytes lost during drinking, supporting optimal hydration levels for a refreshed feeling.

vitamin B6
Vitamin B6 helps your body regulate electrolyte levels, assisting in fluid balance and reducing the effects of dehydration.

settings.head: NO NAUSEA
settings.content:
ginger
Ginger contains bioactive compounds like gingerol and shogaols, which soothes an upset stomach and eases digestive discomfort, providing gentle relief from nausea and indigestion often experienced after drinking

settings.head: NO HANGXIETY
settings.content:
aswagandha
Ashwagandha is an adaptogenic herb known to reduce stress and anxiety levels, promoting relaxation and mental well-being.

brami
Brami, also known as Bacopa monnieri, is an herb traditionally used to improve cognitive function, memory, and concentration, supporting mental clarity and focus during hangovers.

ginkgo biloba
Ginkgo Biloba is known for its cognitive-enhancing properties that improves memory, concentration, and overall mental acuity, so you can stay sharp and focused even after a night out.

settings.head: LIVER DETOX
settings.content:
grape seed extract
Grape seed extract contains potent antioxidants called proanthocyanidins, which helps fighting off free radicals, reduce oxidative stress, and support overall health and wellbeing, particularly during periods of alcohol-induced oxidative damage.

pepperine
Pepperine, found in black pepper, supports body natural detoxification processes, aiding liver health and function to promote a healthier recovery from alcohol consumption.

turmeric
Turmeric contains curcumin, a compound known for its anti-inflammatory and antioxidant properties, which support liver health and aid in detoxification, essential for reducing hangover-related liver stress and promoting recovery.

andrographis extract
Andrographis extract contains compounds like andrographolides, which support liver health and detoxification, helping your body process alcohol more efficiently and reducing the impact of hangover symptoms.

settings.head:
you can also consume it daily to
IMPROVE OVERALL WELLBEING
& STAY HYDRATED
